cleaned_text: Articles & Resources Children and Chiropractic Neurosensory Dysfunction [Intersect 4 Kids](https://intersect4life.com/) [What is Sensory Processing Disorder](https://pathwaystofamilywellness.org/childrens-health-wellness/what-is-sensory-processing-disorder.html) Article by Dr. Monica Buerger DC [Integrated Listening Systems](http://www.integratedlistening.com) Improving cognitive skills, communication, processing, concentration & memory Autism Information [Autism Research Institute](https://autism.org/) [Talk About Curing Autism](https://tacanow.org/) [AutismOne](https://www.autismone.org/) Can Be Done To Article by Maureen McDonnell, RN [Sleep Help](https://raisingchildren.net.au/autism/health-wellbeing/sleep/sleep-for-children-with-asd) Prescription-free options for helping autistic children get a better night's sleep
